## ErrorHandler.(constructor)

Creates a new ErrorHandler instance with the provided strategies. Strategies are evaluated in order until one can handle the error.

**Signature:**

```typescript
constructor(strategies: IErrorHandlingStrategy[]);
```

</td><td>
